duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and manage healthcare projects with a focus on implementation, activation, and upgrades.
Utilize solid radiology experience to drive project success and quality outcomes.
Apply interface knowledge to streamline processes and improve workflow efficiency.
Collaborate with healthcare teams to ensure seamless integration of new systems and solutions.
Facilitate and drive project meetings, ensuring clear communication and effective decision-making.

education_certification.credential: PMP Certification in Project Management (Healthcare experience required)
